channel.title: console-api on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in console-api on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Browsers Console API (Firefox, Safari, Chrome, Opera, IE) reference
item.description: What is Console API ? , I think this is the first question that will cross your mind if you dont know about this helpfull tool, Console is a global variable/Object that provided by major browser like firefox,safari,chrome, etc… and contains many methods that allow you to write to the browser console to expose information that is flowing through your scripts. Console API has become a standard for debugging javascript, so I suppose many browser should support
